package.description:
ROS bindings for the Create/Roomba driver.
This is based on otl_roomba driver by OTL, ported to use create_driver instead. This also contains a 'bonus' feature from the turtlebot driver by Xuwen Cao and Morgan Quigley.
Forked from turtlebot project to make generic Create driver
package.author: Ken Conley, Melonee Wise, Jeff Rousseau
